layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x0
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x0
layer at (0,0) size 800x20
  LayoutBlockFlow (positioned) {HEAD} at (0,0) size 800x20 [bgcolor=#FFFF00]
layer at (0,0) size 800x20
  LayoutBlockFlow (positioned) {BODY} at (0,0) size 800x20 [color=#000080] [bgcolor=#FFFFFF]
    LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 800x18
      LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 280x18
        text run at (0,0) width 280: "This line should have a yellow background."
